name: rtf-to-bbcode
description: Converts RTF to bbcode, for posting to your favorite forum

scripts.update-coc: weallbehave -o . && git add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md && git commit -m 'docs(coc): updated CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md'
scripts.update-contrib: weallcontribute -o . && git add CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit -m 'docs(contributing): updated CONTRIBUTING.md'

author: Rebecca Turner <me@re-becca.org> (http://re-becca.org/)
